name: The Heroic Shooter
description:
The Heroic Shootout

The Heroic Shootout is a 2d shooter. Fight across several maps getting new weapons by killing lots of squares. They may only look like shapes but they are deadly and ready to attack you over and over again. Don't let your guard down. The starting down is your respond area. Follow the arrows off the map to start fighting.

Controls

- To pick up your weapon press E

- To drop your weapon press Q

- Left Click on your mouse to shoot

- To move around use the AWDS keys.

- If your new to the game press T to pratice your skills before you get into the battlefield

- To return to the city press Escape

The game has a lot of work still need to be done. Please comment to give me some ideas on how to improve the game.

Website: http://www.i-m.mx/kevinlion/SlayerEntertainmentStu...
